website_summaries.verdict: Low priced flip-top USB lighter that has multiple stylish design options in a zinc alloy body.
pros: Has a really good build quality versus other USB lighters
Doesn't create as much of a high-pitched sound as some other USB lighters
A pretty good price point versus similar models
cons: Won't light some items with large surface areas
Battery charge is limited to about 50 ignitions

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging
customer_reviews.text: Five star rating is for the seller - not the lighter itself. I really liked this lighter - it worked great in the wind, and seemed like it was exactly what I wanted. I was prepared to write a great review, but after 45 days (too late to return it) it stopped charging. I tried another USB cord to see if the problem was the cord, but that didn't work either. I am very disappointed, the seller earns 5 stars. They responded quickly to my concern, and offered a full refund without having to send the item back. Seller is highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: lllll

customer_reviews.title: It’s bad
customer_reviews.text: It looks cool it works fine but i had it for a few days i left it on my counter and left to LA, my beother calls me the next day telling me my room stinks he goes in and he sees the eletric lighter blew up?
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great beach lighter
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my wife, who would cover her head like a Druid priest to light her cigarette in the wind. Afraid she was going to light more than intended I researched electric lighters. This one had the best reviews and has lived up to them so far. Nice weight, doesn't feel cheaply made. Had it for almost a week with no need to charge it yet. Honestly writing this review so that Maryna will take a shot of tequila. Thanks for the great product!
customer_reviews.author: John C Vick Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great lighter. It keeps a long charge
customer_reviews.text: Great lighter. It keeps a long charge. This is much better than the other much higher rated plasma lighters. I have had to return others for not keeping a charge or not charging anymore. Nice design and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hribal

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift for a friend. He's raved ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend. He's raved about it since he got it. Many compliments! People GIVE him a cigarette, for the privilege of borrowing the lighter. Lol! Many of these electric lighters have a high pitched screech when activated. Apparently, the sound is minimal with this particular model, for what it's worth. Charges quickly, too.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana LaGrave

customer_reviews.title: Value purchase
customer_reviews.text: Liked this USB lighter, pretty in design and economical in long term used compared to the conventional lighter using lighter fluids. I used this for lighting votive candles, no need for matches anymore to light candles. I bought another one to give to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Vinceley

customer_reviews.title: Super cool!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It looks so cool, and I've gotten many friends excited about it. Being flameless, I never have to worry about running out of butane. It charges fast and is easy and safe to operate. Only downside is being flameless, you have to get what you're lighting right up in there. 95% of the time that's perfectly fine, but sometimes a short candle wick can be a pain and I have to light a second thing to spread the flame. But overall, adore this little lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Overall nice product
customer_reviews.text: Received my lighter was impressed it feels very well made and expensive looking. I charged it up and used it on many different things. To light a cigarette the space between the two points is not quite big enough but it does serve its purpose. Windproof? Definitely!! lighting paper for lets say and fire works well, been using for a while now and its still on same charge. Overall nice product my only gripe is to small between the two points to light anything bigger then a cigarette.
customer_reviews.author: Rick kale

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool to show off.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lighter, it feels very futuristic. It cimes with a micro usb cable which is a nice gesture. It lights pretty well, the only downside is the gap between the two points is very narrow, so not a lot of objects fit through it. A standard cigarette or cigarilli is too thick. I've found that if you hold your cigar or cigarette close to the electricity and just puff puff, it will kind of suck in the electricity, and light it that way. Its pretty cool to show off also.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: First off the customer service alone is amazing wish all companies were as helpful and customer oriented like this. I bought this for my mother-in-law for Christmas and she loves it, she can even use it on the boat when it gets really windy and doesnt have to cover. Over all I think its really neat and has that wow factor.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me. Very good quality and quality would recommend it to anyone who needs a lighter. It works really well in the wind and the rain too..
customer_reviews.author: jackie dean

customer_reviews.title: little pricey, good quality, fun
customer_reviews.text: fun, great concept and works every time if charged. holds a charge about as long as the new cellphones so you will need to have a charger handy after a week. the colors are amazing. great gift, stocking stuffer. wind will effect the product but not nearly as much as a standard lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Unbiased

customer_reviews.title: great. but.
customer_reviews.text: Great lighter, very easy to use. Have not yet used it enough where the battery has died so I can't speak for the length of charge it holds. The only thing I wish I had thought of was it doesn't light candles in jars very well because the way the 'flame' is situated, a lighter like this is great for lighting other stuff just not candles in jars.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for christmas presents... they had a charge when I got them and I will recharge before I give them as gifts..I hope that the seller will honor their comment on after 60 days since they will not be given until december
customer_reviews.author: judi

customer_reviews.title: greeeaattt
customer_reviews.text: i got the package on time and pretty fast it was in a nice package. i haven’t used it yet but i have tested out lighting something out, it is nice, has a nice look to it and handy unlike gas lighters tht run out and are cheaply made. what i wish it had was a light or something to tell you how much power it has left. anyways no bad things on it and i got their email. they definitely care more about customer satisfaction than anything thts why i’m rating a 4 star i would say almost close to 5 but i just wanted tht battery light to tell you how much power was left in it
customer_reviews.author: Jhonatan

customer_reviews.title: but that still great because you’re saving money on lighter fluid and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had to change this in a long time a few months months or maybe just a month, but that still great because you’re saving money on lighter fluid and it looks really nice now letting you know you do have to hold up anything you want to burn close mostly recommend for cigarettes and cigars.
customer_reviews.author: Tony R.

customer_reviews.title: Fun While it Lasted
customer_reviews.text: This lighter was fine for a few months, but then the charging port developed a bad connection and now it won't charge. I guess I'll stick to butane lighters; they light fast and refill fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very  disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Great looking lighter used it once didnt work after the first use ...very disappointed with it i tired recharging lights on but nothing

customer_reviews.title: Almost impossible to charge without spit & a string

customer_reviews.author: anomonus

customer_reviews.title: Mines didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Great boxing...but mines came broken. I charged it for 1 hour, then still didn’t work. Waste my money
customer_reviews.author: Brycen

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas and it still hasn't been charged. Granted, it doesn't get much use. It's a good little gadget, I enjoy having it around 😊

customer_reviews.text: worked good for about 3 hours then needed to be recharged again, after3 days quit working altogether wont charge now Update the seller refunded the cost will probably buy from seller again
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Keyport

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Not really that windproof and can’t really be used to light bowls, only doobs really. But it is pretty cool and the quality is nice. Just be aware of its limitations before buying.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, efficient, and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality for the price. I don't smoke so I haven't used it that frequently since I bought it but it was fully charged out of the box and hasn't died yet after weeks of random 1-4 second bursts. Added this gem to survival bag along with my solar panel device charger.

customer_reviews.title: No fuel lighter.
customer_reviews.text: Feels sturdy enough. It's wind proof and have resisted a couple of falls. It charges in 10-15 minutes and lasts 3 days (had it for 3 months).

customer_reviews.text: What a conversation starter! Most hear comment, “ what the...???” Handy and convenient as no fuel is required, so as long as you have access to a USB port you are golden.The finish on this is much nicer than expected.

customer_reviews.title: It was broken
customer_reviews.text: This was broken and did not work when I received it. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality speaks for itself: this thing is AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t often feel compelled to write a review, so I generally don’t. However, I gonna make an exception for this little lighter. First off, it came almost fully charged. That’s rare. Second, it’s small and lightweight. It will add very little weight and take up very little space in your backpack or bugout bag. There’s a built in safety feature that shuts off the arcs after approximately 5 seconds. For $16, you’ll be hard-pressed to find a better flameless lighter than this. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McCabe

customer_reviews.title: Lights quick but the material must be between the electrodes.
customer_reviews.text: Solid lighter. Fit and finish was better than expected... like I would seriously give this as a gift to a friend or relative. Charging is quick via the provided microusb cable. In use, paper lights quick (quicker than a gas lighter) but the material must be between the electrodes to work. I like this lighter for prepping because it depends on electricity to work and not fossil fuel. If I have a solar panel or hand crank generator or a battery charger, I'll have a lighter I can count on.
customer_reviews.author: Amadeus Platypus III

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about a year- and then...
customer_reviews.text: Even though it didn't have a battery or charging problem, it gradually melted the tips away from use. Lasted about a year before that happened. It doesn't have enough current available to arc very well any more. Was great while it lasted though...
customer_reviews.author: D. B. Powers

customer_reviews.title: use it every day
customer_reviews.text: works well use it every day since i bought it only had to charge it once i have got it i have even dropped it while getting out of my truck it only got a small scuff mark on the finish it burns paper plastic rope anything you can fit in the opening.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: What a cool lighter! It's electronic and butane free. It's a dual arc plasma lighter. Great for lighting anything from cigarettes to candles. Recharges fast and lasts a long time per charge. Neat design. Perfect gift.

customer_reviews.title: No more disposable or refillable lighters needed!!

customer_reviews.title: Too Cool
customer_reviews.text: This little unit works supper well. We use it for cutting and fusing small ropes used in power equipment. If you fuse the rope with heat it keeps it from fraying. This little lighter cuts and fusing perfectly. Lasts a good long time between charges and is just cool.

product_meta.title: Arc Plasma Lighter Windproof Arc Lighters Flameless USB Lighter Rechargeable Electric Lighter lcfun Pulse Dual Arc Lighter
feature_bullets: ❤️Simply Lines ▶fashion simple appearance design,all zinc alloy body appearance using double-sided process,classic and durable arc lighter.

❤️Economical & Eco-Friendly ▶ this usb lighter is rechargeable electric lighter,no gas or butane required,no more refilling! light about 50 cigarettes (According to 7s/time) per full charged,save your money.

❤️Windproof Lighter ▶ no flame,weather resistant,works well in rainy day and windy day,it is great for camping,travelling and hiking. If the lid is closed,the arc plasma lighter won't light up,power-off protection.
❤️Charging & Material ▶rechargeable usb lighter,easily finish about 1.5 hours full charged at your home,office,in your car or from any powered USB Power sources. Comfortable,stylish and durable.
❤️After-sales Service ▶60 day guarantee,if more than 60 days,if there are any problem or good ideas,please feel free to contact us,we are ready to help!
